titleStmt.title: The Batchellors banquet, or, A banquet for batchellors wherein is prepared sundry dainty dishes to furnish their tables curiously drest and seriously served in : [p]leasantly discoursing the variable humours of women, their quickness of wits and unsearchable deceits.

notesStmt.note: An adaptation of "Quinze joyes de mariage," 15th century French satire on women.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
